profileRegister.title: Register profile
profileRegister.promptText: Please fill out the following information and submit your identification documents.

certification.promptText:
Please upload a copy of requested identification documents for both categories of A and B.
You may submit the same document twice if it fulfil the requested information.

personal.title: A : Proof of Identity
personal.warningBody: ※ One copy of official document or piece of evidence that verify your identity.
personal.warningBody2: ※ To ensure smooth processing, please provide both sides of your document if applicable.

address.title: B : Proof of Address
address.warningBody: ※ One copy of official document or piece of evidence that states your name and address. Confidential information you do not wish us to view may be redacted prior to submission.

officialGovernmentDocument.label: Official government document
officialGovernmentDocument.description: Passport, driver's license, national identity card, social security card, birth certificate. For Japanese residents, My Number Card is accepted.

financialDocument.label: Financial document dated within the last 3 months
financialDocument.description: Bank statement, credit card statement, tax return form.

billingDocument.label: Utility bill dated within the last 3 months
billingDocument.description: Water, electricity or gas bill with your name and address.

otherForPersonal.label: Other
otherForPersonal.description: Health insurance document with name and date of birth, or any other equivalent identification document in your country of residence.

otherForAddress.label: Other
otherForAddress.description: Other valid official document that verifies your name and address, in your country of residence.

premise.body: These Terms of Use ("Terms") are a legal agreement between you and [Your Company Name] ("we," "us," or "our") governing your use of our website, products, and services (collectively referred to as the "Services"). By accessing or using our Services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Services.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.body: By using our Services, you affirm that you are at least 18 years old and capable of entering into a legally binding agreement. If you are using our Services on behalf of an organization, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

changesToTerms.title: 2. Changes to Terms
changesToTerms.body: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. The most recent version will be posted on our website, and your continued use of the Services after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms.

useOfService.title: 3. Use of Services
useOfService.body: You agree to use our Services in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. You also agree not to:

userAccount.title: 4. User Account
userAccount.body: Terms of Useは仮のため、実際の文言に修正する必要あり。

shippingAddressOptions.sameAsAccountAddress: Shipping to the same address as your account information
shippingAddressOptions.newAddress: Shipping to an address different from your account information
